p: Enzyme extract was prepared by grinding one gram of leaf in liquid nitrogen. The obtained powder was added in 10 mL of 50 mM phosphate buffer (pH 7.0) and was mixed with 1 mM Ethylene Diamine Tetra Acetic acid (EDTA) and 1% polyvinylpyrrolidone (PVP). The whole mixture was centrifuged at 13,000× g for 20 min at 4 °C. The supernatant was used for the enzyme assay.
